Text:
I want to make calculator of a window. it's working but I need now to animate the configuration of the window.
so, the default window size is 250px height and 350px width. I made 4 buttons:
increase height, decrease height, increase width and decrease width

now I need to make a code in jquery that if I click on the increase height button to add 1px and the height to become 251px. and so on, if I click decrease width , the size of the window's width to decrease with 1px for every click on that button.

thanks for all

ok, until now I've made this:


    
    $("#inch").click(function(){
    
    var height = $("#divid").height()+1; //to decrease just -1 instead of 1
    
    $("#divid").height( height );
    })
    $("#dech").click(function(){
    
    var height = $("#divid").height()-1; //to decrease just -1 instead of 1
    
    $("#divid").height( height );
    })
    $("#incw").click(function(){
    
    var width= $("#divid").width()+1; //to decrease just -1 instead of 1
    
    $("#divid").width( width );
    })
    $("#decw").click(function(){
    
    var width= $("#divid").width()-1; //to decrease just -1 instead of 1
    
    $("#divid").width( width );
    })

I've made this until now, but how to make to increase/decrease holding the click for x seconds. thanks for all ok, until now I've made this, thanks to NullPointer: html:
div
jquery: $("#inch").click(function(){ var height = $("#divid").height()+1; //to decrease just -1 instead of 1 $("#divid").height( height ); }) $("#dech").click(function(){ var height = $("#divid").height()-1; //to decrease just -1 instead of 1 $("#divid").height( height ); }) $("#incw").click(function(){ var width= $("#divid").width()+1; //to decrease just -1 instead of 1 $("#divid").width( width ); }) $("#decw").click(function(){ var width= $("#divid").width()-1; //to decrease just -1 instead of 1 $("#divid").width( width ); })
